title: Social Media Ads Specialist
job_overview:
Social Media Ads Specialist
We’re hiring a Social Media Ads Specialist to lead campaigns on Facebook, Instagram, and TikTok. You’ll help boost brand visibility and direct conversions.

Requirements:

1+ year of experience with paid social campaigns

In-depth understanding of social ad formats and user behavior

Creative thinker with a results-driven mindset

Please send your CV to: Upgrade to see actual info
We do not respond to messages via onlinejobs.
